means: 过去的（不愉快的）事( bygone的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: Our attitude is one of letting bygones be bygones.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们的态度是既往不咎.

sentence.Network_en: I'm willing to let bygones be bygones.

sentence.Network_cn: 过去的事就让它过去吧.

PerfectNetExp.abs: bygones bygones . We are still friends ., 让过往的事过去吧 , 我们还是好朋友.
Why don ' t you just let bygones be bygones ., 你何不让过去的事就过去.
Let ' s not talk of bygones ., 我们不要谈旧事了.
Let bygones be bygones ., 让过去的事过去吧.

list.abs: 过去12个月,Last Twelve... ... ) Last Twelve Months 过去12个月 ) bygone days;former days;the past 过去的岁月.
bygone days是什么意思_百度知道 ... When Love Is Bygone: 当爱已成往事 bygone days： 过去的日子 Ode to Bygone Days: 思旧赋.
Together , it a testament to a bygone age ., 所有的这些一起见证了一个逝去的年代.
the dusty precepts of a bygone era ., 过去时代的枯燥戒律.
never too old to learn.20.既往不咎 let bygonesbe bygones
Why don ' t you just let bygones be bygones ., 你何不让过去的事就过去.

entry.tran: 过去已久的；很久以前的
entry.def: Bygone means happening or existing a very long time ago.

example.ex: The book recalls other memories of a bygone age.
example.tran: 这本书追忆了一个久远时代的别样记忆。

entry.tran: 让过去的事过去；冰释前嫌
entry.def: If two people let bygones be bygones, they decide to forget about unpleasant things that have happened between them in the past.

auth_sentence.content: I'd offer to let bygones be bygones, I'd take him to dinner, I'd throw a steak into him, for Christ's sake.
auth_sentence.res_content: I'd offer to let bygones be bygones, I'd take him to dinner, I'd throw a steak into him, for Christ's sake.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I'd offer to let bygones be bygones, I'd take him to dinner, I'd throw a steak into him, for Christ's sake.

auth_sentence.content: In making his announcement to step aside, Mr Thaksin urged Thais to re-unite and "let bygones be bygones".
auth_sentence.res_content: In making his announcement to step aside, Mr Thaksin urged Thais to re-unite and "let bygones be bygones".
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In making his announcement to step aside, Mr Thaksin urged Thais to re-unite and "let bygones be bygones".

auth_sentence.content: So can we let bygones be bygones and just get along?????

auth_sentence.res_content_con: So can we let bygones be bygones and just get along?????
